message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm happy to offer it to you for $115.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle on $110?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we meet at $108?
